price: ali Gospodar tvoj je prema tebi milostiv i Njegova dobrota prema tebi, zaista, je velika.
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ فَضۡلَهُۥ كَانَ عَلَيۡكَ كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan min rabbika inna faḍlahu kāna ʿalayka kabīran
